body:
If you are at risk of losing your home, contact Shelter for help: [https://england.shelter.org.uk/get_help](https://england.shelter.org.uk/get_help)

Citizens Advice can also help if you are being evicted because you asked for repairs to be done. See: [https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/housing/renting-privately/ending-your-tenancy/if-youre-being-evicted-because-you-asked-for-repairs/](https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/housing/renting-privately/ending-your-tenancy/if-youre-being-evicted-because-you-asked-for-repairs/)

This information service doesn't deal with contesting evictions or finding emergency housing. If you'd like to find out about addressing another issue with your home, you can continue.
heading: If you are concerned about losing your home
